Name: Rojas Binny
Heading: My experience of PESU ECC with a few deets of the RR Campus too
Review:
The fees for PESSAT and JEE Mains students are 4.1L per year. The fee for KCET students is around 1L per year.
The fee for management quota students is 10L. This is excluding the 10,000 that has to be paid additionally in the first year.
There are a few scholarships available. The 2 major ones are MRD and CNR Rao. The MRD one is given to those who are in the top 20% based on SGPA every sem. They get back 20% of their tuition fees back per sem. As I am A PESSAT student, this comes up to around 70k per sem.

The CNR Rao one is based on CGPA and is also given out every sem. This is for 25% of the tuition fees per sem. It is given to the top 5% of students. Overall you could save upto 40 or 50% respectively with MRD and CNR Rao scholarships.
Additionally from second years, there are also opportunities for teaching assistantships, where you would be paid on an hourly basis and you get paid more if you can teach the higher years. I am not exactly sure of the amount that is given though.
